function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Delay in initiating social distancing and closure of schools and universities","Impact":"Increase in confirmed cases and ICU patient incidence","Mitigation":"Implement early triggers for social distancing policies","Technologies":"Data analysis and monitoring tools for early detection","People":"General public, healthcare workers, students, teachers","Owner":"Government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Uncertainty in the reproduction number (R0) and severity of the virus","Impact":"Inability to accurately predict the effectiveness of policies","Mitigation":"Continuous monitoring and updating of R0 and severity data","Technologies":"Epidemiological modeling and simulation tools","People":"Epidemiologists, researchers, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Prolonged implementation of social distancing measures","Impact":"Potential negative impact on mental health and economy","Mitigation":"Implement support systems for mental health and economic relief programs","Technologies":"Telemedicine, online counseling services, economic stimulus tools","People":"General public, mental health professionals, economists","Owner":"Government, non-profit organizations"}]}
